text: Eric Lopez (born April 20, 1978)https://twitter.com/IamEricLopez/status/550379506179899393 is an American voice actor, best known for his voice role of Blue Beetle in Young Justice. Lopez is the current voice of the Bumblebee Man in The Simpsons. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:American voice actors Category:American video game actors Category:Actors from Havana
title: Eric Lopez
